title: MS increase, SR inflation, no LR output increase

content.question: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, an increase in the money supply will result in an increase in

choices.label: output in the short run and in the long run
inflation in the short run and an increase in output in the long run
inflation in the short run and no change in output in the long run
output in the long run but not in the short run
output in the long run and no change in inflation in the short run

content.answer: inflation in the short run and no change in output in the long run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
